alert.note: Alert for Logan (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 25 at 8:22PM CDT until May 25 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Logan County in central Illinois... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 822 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mount Pulaski, or 13 miles south of Lincoln, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Mount Pulaski around 825 PM CDT. Chestnut around 830 PM CDT. Lincoln and Beason around 835 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Atlanta. This includes the following highways... Interstate 155 between mile markers 0 and 10. Interstate 55 between mile markers 116 and 141. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
